A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: How did this screenplay even make it past the editing table? This movie is full of plot holes bigger than The Supremacy\, overplayed humor\, and a complete lack of respect for Star Wars lore\, characters\, and fans of the franchize.  0/5 Will not see again\, will not purchase\, will not go see any Star Wars movie directed by Rian Johnson in the future.  This was a JOKE\, and as with many of the \"slapstick\" moments in the movie\, I am not laughing.\n\nUpdate: I am reposting this with a score above 1/2 star ONLY because I've been told that 1/2 stars \"don't count\" towards the total audience score.  What bullcrap.
